summary: This module provides a suite of unit tests that validate the behavior of memory pinning and unpinning operations for PyTorch tensors within the DGL backend, covering scenarios such as empty tensors, non‑contiguous layouts, column pinning, tensor views, and automatic unpinning.
business_intent: Ensure the correctness and stability of the pin‑memory feature in the PyTorch integration of the DGL library, preventing regressions and guaranteeing proper handling of various tensor configurations.
